improvement: Evaluation mode: using predetermined tool configuration
description: Validate any email address to definitively confirm it is properly formatted, active, and can receive emails with real existence verification. Instantly check email validity with industry-leading accuracy, comprehensive syntax validation, and confirm deliverability for both standard and international domains including edge cases. Automatically handles misspelled, malformed, or complex email addresses with auto-correction capabilities and comprehensive correctness checking to ensure reliable email validation and real existence confirmation for all email formats.
name: validate_email
